item.title: Touch Typing: Spacebar and Thumbs
item.description: Traditional keyboards have a large spacebar that is available for both thumbs. On split keyboards, I often see the spacebar key only on one side - left or right. But what is better? Should the spacebar be pressed by the left or right thumb? Or is it better to alternate thumbs? A collection of links to touch typing tutors and games.
